citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am to 11:20 am
on March 15, 2022. During that time the inspectors knocked on door, spoke with licensee's wife who could not locate her
husband, and waited over an hour at the facility.
Additional Inspectors:
CHRISTINA RADZAI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am to 11:20 am 
on March 15, 2022. During that time the inspectors knocked on door, spoke with licensee's wife who could not locate her 
husband, and waited over an hour at the facility. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
CHRISTINA RADZAI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
